snippet: McCaffrey led No. 7 Stanford to the Pacific-12 Conference championship on Saturday with a 41-22 win over No. 24 Southern California in Santa Clara, Calif.
abstract: College Football Roundup; Stanford defeats South California, 41-22, to win Pacific-12 Conference championship game; other college football games and news noted.
lead_paragraph: McCaffrey led No. 7 Stanford to the Pacific-12 Conference championship on Saturday with a 41-22 win over No. 24 Southern California in Santa Clara, Calif.

headline.print_headline: McCaffrey Breaks 27-Year-Old N.C.A.A. Record, Leading Stanford to Pac-12 Title
headline.main: Christian McCaffrey Breaks 27-Year-Old N.C.A.A. Record, Leading Stanford to Pac-12 Title
